definition[0]: a game or toy that has a lot of pieces that you have to fit together
definition[1]: a game in which you have to think hard to solve a difficult question or problem
definition[2]: something that is difficult to understand or explain
example[2]: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
example[3]: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
example[4]: the puzzle of how the sun works
definition[3]: to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something
example[5]: a question that continues to puzzle scientists
example[6]: He was puzzled by the reactions to his remark.
example[7]: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
